channel.title: doc-archive – Learning resources
channel.description: Recent content in Learning resources on doc-archive

item.title: Docs: Scientific computing
item.description:
Basic

  • Best practices for scientific computing - Helpful suggestions for good computing practice.
  • Good enough practices in scientific computing - Helpful suggestions for good computing practice.

Numerical linear algebra (Applied linear algebra)

  • Introduction to Applied Linear Algebra – Vectors, Matrices, and Least Squares - Entry-level textbook.

Differential equation

  • Solving PDEs in parallel on GPUs with Julia - This course aims to cover state-of-the-art methods in modern parallel GPU computing, supercomputing and code development with applications to natural sciences and engineering.

item.title: Docs: Inverse problem
item.description: • GIFtoolsCookbook - Fundamentals of Inversions - Briefly describe the basic concepts of inversion, readers can further study the keywords mentioned in the article.
